ComicInfo.Summary:
SERIES FINALE
"CODA OBSCURA, PART TWO: SAUDADE"
Thirty years later. One last adventure. One final goodbye. KEATINGE and DEL DUCA wrap up their long-running, critically acclaimed series by uncovering the mystery Kate Kristopher has searched for since the very beginning.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Leila del Duca and Owen Gieni | 1 | | B | Images of Tomorrow Variant Cover B | Leila del Duca and Owen Gieni | 2 |
